context: Mid-size regional bank evaluating investment in next-generation digital banking platform to compete with fintech challengers

request.purpose: Implementation of cloud-based digital banking platform with mobile app, API integrations, and AI-driven personalization
request.justification: Market share erosion to digital-first competitors, customer expectation for 24/7 banking services

decision_process.outcome: Selected vendor with strongest security and integration capabilities

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15% increase in digital customer acquisition, 25% reduction in operational costs, improved customer satisfaction scores

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Platform launched successfully, 40% customer migration achieved, initial cost savings of $2.1M
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Full implementation complete, 85% digital transaction increase, ROI tracking at 94% of projections

lessons_learned: Phased approach mitigated risks, early user testing improved adoption, vendor partnership model enhanced implementation success
